name: WP Social Follower
author: Liton Arefin

sections.description:
WP Social Follower is a plugin which takes a simple, extendable approach to display links along with social icons to your social networking profiles in WordPress.
It allows you to share your social contacts and news feeds through your WordPress website.

You will find following plugin with options:

  • Background Color
  • Background Hover Color
  • Icon Color
  • Icon Hover Color
  • Icon to circle
  • Input fields to input your social profile links
  • Input fields to input your social profile informations
  • Widget Usage

Here are the social networks to share your contacts are given below

  • facebook
  • twitter
  • dribbble
  • google
  • youtube
sections.installation:
1. Download and activate the plugin
  2. Go to Appearance => Widgets
  3. Search for WP Social Follower and then add to your widget sidebar
  4. Choose the Options of your choice
  5. Input you social URL(s) in input boxes
  6. Click Save button

Or

  1. Put the plug-in folder WP Social Follower into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go into the WordPress admin interface and activate the plugin
  3. Go to Appearance => Widgets, search for WP Social Follower and then add to your widget
  4. Choose the Options of your choice
  5. Input you social URL(s) in input boxes
  6. Click Save button

Have fun!!!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download and activate the plugin
  2. Go to Appearance => Widgets
  3. Search for WP Social Follower and then add to your widget sidebar
  4. Choose the Options of your choice
  5. Input you social URL(s) in input boxes
  6. Click Save button

Or

  1. Put the plug-in folder WP Social Follower into [wordpress_dir]/wp-content/plugins/
  2. Go into the WordPress admin interface and activate the plugin
  3. Go to Appearance => Widgets, search for WP Social Follower and then add to your widget
  4. Choose the Options of your choice
  5. Input you social URL(s) in input boxes
  6. Click Save button

Have fun!!!

What does this plugin do?

  • The WP Social Follower takes a simple, extendable approach to display links and icons to your social networking profiles in WordPress.

Still have some questions ?

short_description: A widget plugin to add links of social networking sites.

screenshots.caption: Give a title to the widget and the necessary information to set up your social network profile.
After saving the settings in the widget section the plugin will show the numnber of likes/follwers/subscribers in your WordPress website.
